title: The ingenious braggadocia who thinks to obliege by boasting of his large possessions, yet was very unwilling to lose much time in wooing; but being married, was in a weeks time acquainted with an aching forehead. To the tune of, Cook Laurel.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, J. Clarke, W. Thackeray, & T. Passenger,
